service_package.name: Professional Website Security Audit
service_package.value_proposition: Identify security vulnerabilities before hackers do

delivery_process: Day 1: Client engagement and scope confirmation
Day 4: Client consultation and remediation guidance
Day 5: Payment collection (50% upfront, 50% on delivery)
competitive_advantages: Anonymous LLC for privacy and professionalism

email_template.subject: Security Audit for [Business Name] Website
email_template.body:
Hi [Business Owner],

I found your website and noticed you may have security vulnerabilities that could put your business and customers at risk.

I'm offering a comprehensive Professional Website Security Audit for just $997 (normally $2,500+). This includes:

✅ Complete vulnerability assessment
✅ Security header analysis  
✅ SSL/TLS configuration review
✅ Professional report with fix recommendations
✅ 48-hour delivery guaranteed

I use enterprise-grade testing methodology (the same framework used by Fortune 500 companies) to identify and help fix security issues before hackers exploit them.

Would you be interested in a quick 15-minute call to discuss your current security setup?

Best regards,
[Your Name]
Alpine Security Consulting LLC

day_1: Set up Alpine Security Consulting LLC (if not done)
day_2: Send 50 cold emails to target businesses
day_3: Begin security assessments using MCP orchestrator
